articles.title: Rare New Zealand black-fronted tern seen in Australia for first time - ABC News
articles.description: Birdwatchers are marvelling over the sighting of an endangered black-fronted tern on Australian shores. It’s a bird endemic to New Zealand and has never been seen here before.

A rare, endangered New Zealand bird has been seen in Australia for the first time.
